content: वस् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (वसति, sometimes वसते, उवास, अवात्सति, वत्स्यति, वस्तुं, उषित) {@--1@} To dwell, inhabit, live, stay, abide, reside (usually with <ab>loc.</ab>; but sometimes <ab>acc.</ab>); धीरसमीरे यमुनातीरे वसति वने वनमाली <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To be, exist, be found in; वसंति हि प्रेम्णि गुणा न वस्तुनि <ls>Ki. 8. 37</ls>; यत्राकृतिस्तत्र गुणा वसंतिः भूतिः श्रीर्ह्रीर्धृतिः कीर्तिर्दक्षे वसति नालसे <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--3@} To spend, pass (as time) (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to dwell to dwell, lodge, people. {@--2@} To receive hospitably. {@--3@} To dwell, inhabit. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (विवत्सति) To wish to dwell. {vII.v} {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> (वस्ते) To wear, put on; वसने परिधूसरे वसाना <ls>Ś. 7. 21</ls>, <ls>Śi. 9. 75</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 8</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 54</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 9</ls>; <ls>Bk. 4. 10.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (वासयति-ते) To cause to put on. {vIII.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (व स्यति) {@--1@} To be straight. {@--2@} To be firm. {@--3@} To fix. {vIV.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (वासयति-ते) {@--1@} To cut, divide, cut off. {@--2@} To love. {@--3@} To take, accept. {@--4@} To hurt, kill. {@--5@} To offer. {vV.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (वसयति-ते) To scent, perfume.
